text: Debris are visual objects that have no impact on any other object.
Create visual debris of a [Shape, shape] from its [Uuid, uuid], that collides with world objects but does not have an impact on them.
params: The angular velocity in radians per second around the axes (x,y,z). (Defaults to zero)
The color. (Defaults to the shape's default color)
The time the debris will be simulated before disappearing. (Defaults to 10 seconds)
